TimedLoop Methods

Requires: VI Scripting

Inherits from Node»Structure»Loop»WhileLoop. View the class hierarchy.

MethodDescription
Replace With TimedSequenceReplaces a Timed Loop with a Timed Sequence structure and returns a reference of the Timed Sequence structure. Details
Replace With WhileLoopReplaces a Timed Loop with a While Loop and returns a reference to the While Loop. Details
